ModMetaData.name: LMC048.水轮发电机调整
ModMetaData.author: XeoNovaDan
ModMetaData.description: 汉化：jxb12306 Author jxb12306 FROM 3DM Localization Group 合集链接：http://bbs.3dmgame.com/thread-5842015-1-1.html Current Version: v1.2.1 (5th December 2018) Changes the watermill generator in several different ways: 在以下几个方面更改了水轮发电机 * Increases its base power production from 1100W to 1400W 其产生的功率由1100W提升到1400W * Power production is directly influenced by the season 季节会影响到发电量 * Its power production decreases if temperatures are too low or too high 温度过高或者过低会影响到发电量 * Adds a new incident which affects watermill generators, both good and bad 添加了一个新的事件，该事件（湍急的水流）会影响到水轮发电机，有好（发电量会增加）有坏（发电机会损坏） 汉化：jxb12306 合集地址：http://bbs.3dmgame.com/thread-5842015-1-1.html
